com.koalog.util.console
Interface Console

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseConsole
public interface Console

An interface for consoles. A console is an entity that can receive processes output and error streams and feed processes input streams.

Method Summary
 void addErr(java.io.InputStream err)
          Add an error stream to the console.
 void addIn(java.io.OutputStream in)
          Add a console input listener.
 void addOut(java.io.InputStream out)
          Add an output stream to the console.
 

Method Detail

addOut

public void addOut(java.io.InputStream out)
Add an output stream to the console. This means that this method should be used to redirect some process output stream.

Parameters:
out - A process output stream.

addErr

public void addErr(java.io.InputStream err)
Add an error stream to the console. This means that this method should be used to redirect some process error stream.

Parameters:
err - A process error stream.

addIn

public void addIn(java.io.OutputStream in)
Add a console input listener. This means that this method should be used to feed some process input with the console input.

Parameters:
in - A process input stream.
